snippet.title: Battlecruisers Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD BATTLECRUISERS ON PC OR TABLET
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/955870/Battlecruisers/ 
iOS: https://testflight.apple.com/join/R97SYxxn
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Bluebottle.Battlecruisers

RTS - Single Player - 25 Levels - Stunning Visuals - Kickass Music - Warning: Highly Addictive!

- Build the ultimate warship to attack and defend against frigates, artillery, and bombers.
- Lure enemies into tactical traps and destroy them with fighters and rapid attack boats.
- Wreak havoc using death star satellites, nuclear rockets and long-range artillery.
- Unlock insane ultraweapons like the Mann O'War Battleship and the Kamikaze Signal.
- Beat the diabolical AI enemy in 25 addictive and gratifying battles.
- Devour the particle system pyrotechnics that make every explosion unique.
- Set to a dynamic score for music that traces the action of every battle sequence.  

Support our indie game! Follow us for updates and future DLC:
Website: https://BattlecruisersGame.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/battlecruisersgame/
